title: Microsoft Releases Emergency Patch for Zero-Day Vulnerability
excerpt: Critical security update addresses remote code execution flaw being actively exploited by APT groups targeting Windows systems worldwide.

title: New Android Banking Malware 'FakeCalls' Discovered
excerpt: Sophisticated malware intercepts banking calls and steals OTP codes from popular Pakistani banking apps including HBL, UBL, and Easypaisa.

title: ChatGPT-5 Announces Advanced Security Features
excerpt: OpenAI reveals AI-powered malware detection, ethical hacking assistance, and automated vulnerability assessment capabilities.

title: International Police Shut Down Major Dark Web Marketplace
excerpt: Operation DarkNet results in closure of 'ShadowBazaar' and 150+ arrests across 52 countries in coordinated law enforcement action.

title: 5 New Hacking Tools Released for Termux Platform
excerpt: Mobile security researchers release advanced penetration testing tools including MobileRecon v3.0 and TermuxSploit v2.5 for Android devices.

title: Critical Vulnerability Found in Popular VPN Service
excerpt: Security researchers discover DNS leak vulnerability affecting millions of users worldwide, potentially exposing real IP addresses.

title: New Ransomware Group Targets Healthcare Sector
excerpt: CyberHealth ransomware group launches coordinated attacks against hospitals and medical facilities using advanced encryption techniques.

title: GitHub Patches Critical Code Execution Vulnerability
excerpt: Remote code execution flaw in GitHub Actions could allow attackers to compromise CI/CD pipelines and steal source code.
